title: Greece Is Getting Rewired for the Future
content: As climate change bears down, Greece is upending its sources of energy and trying to reshape its economic destiny.

more_info.byline: By Liz Alderman and Eirini Vourloumis

en_title: Greece Is Getting Rewired for the Future
en_content: As climate change bears down, Greece is upending its sources of energy and trying to reshape its economic destiny.

title: The Metaverse Is Mark Zuckerberg’s Escape Hatch
content: If his new strategy works — a big if — it could help address several of Facebook’s biggest problems.
en_title: The Metaverse Is Mark Zuckerberg’s Escape Hatch
en_content: If his new strategy works — a big if — it could help address several of Facebook’s biggest problems.

title: Women May Be Better Investors Than Men. Let Me Mansplain Why.
content: Overconfidence is bad, and women are less likely to fall victim to it.
en_title: Women May Be Better Investors Than Men. Let Me Mansplain Why.
en_content: Overconfidence is bad, and women are less likely to fall victim to it.

title: Wooing Newcomers to ‘NASCAR Nation’
content: The Confederate flag is gone, and a new car is being counted on to bring back classic stock car thrills and reverse more than a decade of fan attrition. Billions ride on its success.

org_facet: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
Chevrolet Division of General Motors Corp

en_title: Wooing Newcomers to ‘NASCAR Nation’
en_content: The Confederate flag is gone, and a new car is being counted on to bring back classic stock car thrills and reverse more than a decade of fan attrition. Billions ride on its success.

title: Apple’s Most Back-Ordered New Product Is Not What You Expect
content: It’s a $19 cloth.
en_title: Apple’s Most Back-Ordered New Product Is Not What You Expect
en_content: It’s a $19 cloth.

title: Old Power Gear Is Slowing Use of Clean Energy and Electric Cars
content: Some people and businesses seeking to use solar panels, batteries and electric vehicles find they can’t because utility equipment needs an upgrade.
en_title: Old Power Gear Is Slowing Use of Clean Energy and Electric Cars
en_content: Some people and businesses seeking to use solar panels, batteries and electric vehicles find they can’t because utility equipment needs an upgrade.

title: Facebook Renames Itself Meta
content: The social network, under fire for spreading misinformation and other issues, said the change was part of its bet on a next digital frontier called the metaverse.
en_title: Facebook Renames Itself Meta
en_content: The social network, under fire for spreading misinformation and other issues, said the change was part of its bet on a next digital frontier called the metaverse.

title: How a Mistake by YouTube Shows Its Power Over Media
content: Novara, a London news group, fell victim to YouTube’s opaque and sometimes arbitrary enforcement of its rules.
en_title: How a Mistake by YouTube Shows Its Power Over Media
en_content: Novara, a London news group, fell victim to YouTube’s opaque and sometimes arbitrary enforcement of its rules.

title: An Arena Where the Goal Is ‘Net Zero’ Carbon Emissions, Even From Fans
content: The operators of Climate Pledge Arena, home to the N.H.L.’s newest team, the Seattle Kraken, plan to reduce and offset its entire planet-warming footprint. They still have a lot to prove.

more_info.byline: By Ken Belson and Lindsey Wasson

en_title: An Arena Where the Goal Is ‘Net Zero’ Carbon Emissions, Even From Fans
en_content: The operators of Climate Pledge Arena, home to the N.H.L.’s newest team, the Seattle Kraken, plan to reduce and offset its entire planet-warming footprint. They still have a lot to prove.

title: Credit Card Debt Is Bad for More Than Just Your Finances
content: A new study says that worries about repaying debt may lead to poor health later in life. So here are some tips for dealing with your bills.
en_title: Credit Card Debt Is Bad for More Than Just Your Finances
en_content: A new study says that worries about repaying debt may lead to poor health later in life. So here are some tips for dealing with your bills.

title: Exxon Mobil and Chevron continue to report higher profits, helped by rising oil prices.
content: In the third quarter, the companies continued their rebound from the collapse in demand at the start of the coronavirus pandemic.
en_title: Exxon Mobil and Chevron continue to report higher profits, helped by rising oil prices.
en_content: In the third quarter, the companies continued their rebound from the collapse in demand at the start of the coronavirus pandemic.

title: The Fed’s favorite inflation index remained at 30-year high as pay surged.
content: The Federal Reserve is closely watching inflation, and the numbers have remained sharply elevated in recent months.
en_title: The Fed’s favorite inflation index remained at 30-year high as pay surged.
en_content: The Federal Reserve is closely watching inflation, and the numbers have remained sharply elevated in recent months.

title: Politico’s journalists are seeking union recognition from its new owner.
content: The labor unit says it has also submitted to the National Labor Relations Board cards from more than 80 percent of eligible workers seeking to form a union.
en_title: Politico’s journalists are seeking union recognition from its new owner.
en_content: The labor unit says it has also submitted to the National Labor Relations Board cards from more than 80 percent of eligible workers seeking to form a union.

title: The eurozone recovery continues, but inflation hits the highest in 13 years.
content: Economic output grew 2.2 percent in the third quarter as the region recovered from a double-dip recession, while inflation jumped to 4.1 percent.
en_title: The eurozone recovery continues, but inflation hits the highest in 13 years.
en_content: Economic output grew 2.2 percent in the third quarter as the region recovered from a double-dip recession, while inflation jumped to 4.1 percent.

title: Could a New Name Help Facebook After All?

en_title: Could a New Name Help Facebook After All?

title: A union election is set for Starbucks workers in the Buffalo area.
content: The company has separately announced wage increases as employers struggle to fill some jobs.

more_info.byline: By Noam Scheiber and Coral Murphy Marcos

en_title: A union election is set for Starbucks workers in the Buffalo area.
en_content: The company has separately announced wage increases as employers struggle to fill some jobs.

title: Program to Lend Billions to Aid California’s Supply-Chain Infrastructure
content: The Transportation Department and the state are teaming up on the program, which aims to prevent a repeat of the supply-chain crisis by bolstering ports and other sources of bottlenecks.
en_title: Program to Lend Billions to Aid California’s Supply-Chain Infrastructure
en_content: The Transportation Department and the state are teaming up on the program, which aims to prevent a repeat of the supply-chain crisis by bolstering ports and other sources of bottlenecks.

title: Producers of Alec Baldwin Film Scrutinized After Shooting
content: The team behind “Rust” chose not to get an insurance package often carried by productions, which some in Hollywood said was a sign of cutting corners.

more_info.byline: By Brooks Barnes and Nicole Sperling

en_title: Producers of Alec Baldwin Film Scrutinized After Shooting
en_content: The team behind “Rust” chose not to get an insurance package often carried by productions, which some in Hollywood said was a sign of cutting corners.

title: Authorities Return 248 Looted Antiquities to India
content: Most of the items were seized from storage space operated by Subhash Kapoor, a former Manhattan gallery owner facing illegal trafficking charges in both India and the United States.
en_title: Authorities Return 248 Looted Antiquities to India
en_content: Most of the items were seized from storage space operated by Subhash Kapoor, a former Manhattan gallery owner facing illegal trafficking charges in both India and the United States.

title: Has the Virus Infected Huge Numbers of Younger Children?
content: Federal scientists estimated that more than 40 percent of children aged 5 to 11 had been infected with the coronavirus by June. Outside experts aren’t so sure.
en_title: Has the Virus Infected Huge Numbers of Younger Children?
en_content: Federal scientists estimated that more than 40 percent of children aged 5 to 11 had been infected with the coronavirus by June. Outside experts aren’t so sure.

title: Citigroup is the first big U.S. bank to mandate vaccination for its workers.
content: The bank will consider requests for medical and religious exemptions.
en_title: Citigroup is the first big U.S. bank to mandate vaccination for its workers.

title: Amazon sales growth slows and costs rise.
content: The company’s profit was lower, largely because of higher labor costs and huge investments in its delivery network.
en_title: Amazon sales growth slows and costs rise.
en_content: The company’s profit was lower, largely because of higher labor costs and huge investments in its delivery network.

title: China Evergrande is said to make another bond payment, avoiding default for a second time.
content: Evergrande has warned in securities filings that it could not guarantee it would meet its financial obligations because of challenges it has faced selling assets.
en_title: China Evergrande is said to make another bond payment, avoiding default for a second time.
en_content: Evergrande has warned in securities filings that it could not guarantee it would meet its financial obligations because of challenges it has faced selling assets.

title: Sean Penn the Focus of N.L.R.B. Amid Comments on Hours and Food at Vaccine Site
content: Two online commenters complained of working 18-hour days and not getting food from Krispy Kreme or Subway. Penn saw “narcissism” and “betrayal.”
en_title: Sean Penn the Focus of N.L.R.B. Amid Comments on Hours and Food at Vaccine Site
en_content: Two online commenters complained of working 18-hour days and not getting food from Krispy Kreme or Subway. Penn saw “narcissism” and “betrayal.”

title: Who Are America’s Billionaires, Anyway?
content: They are tech titans, entertainment moguls and heirs to great fortunes. Their ranks grew during the pandemic, changing the political conversation around taxing the wealthy.

more_info.byline: By Nicholas Kulish, Ephrat Livni and Emma Goldberg

en_title: Who Are America’s Billionaires, Anyway?
en_content: They are tech titans, entertainment moguls and heirs to great fortunes. Their ranks grew during the pandemic, changing the political conversation around taxing the wealthy.

title: In the Biden Bill, the Billionaires Beat the Working Rich
content: One by one, tax proposals that would have slowed dynastic wealth have been tossed from the agreement.
en_title: In the Biden Bill, the Billionaires Beat the Working Rich
en_content: One by one, tax proposals that would have slowed dynastic wealth have been tossed from the agreement.

title: How Biden’s $2 Trillion in Tax Increases Target Companies and the Rich
content: The proposal to fund the president’s sprawling spending plan mostly turns up the dial on more conventional tax policies, while trying to curb maneuvers that allow tax avoidance.
en_title: How Biden’s $2 Trillion in Tax Increases Target Companies and the Rich
en_content: The proposal to fund the president’s sprawling spending plan mostly turns up the dial on more conventional tax policies, while trying to curb maneuvers that allow tax avoidance.

title: Geraldo Rivera criticizes his Fox News colleague Tucker Carlson.
content: “I’m probably going to get in trouble for this,” Mr. Rivera said after taking issue with “false flag” claims in Mr. Carlson’s upcoming three-part series, “Patriot Purge.”

title: Activision Blizzard commits to improving diversity and workplace culture.
content: The video game publisher said it would spend $250 million on hiring more women and those from “underrepresented communities” and adopt a zero-tolerance harassment policy.
en_title: Activision Blizzard commits to improving diversity and workplace culture.
en_content: The video game publisher said it would spend $250 million on hiring more women and those from “underrepresented communities” and adopt a zero-tolerance harassment policy.

title: Saudi Finance Official Is Missing From Conference He Hosts
content: The unexplained absence of Yasir al-Rumayyan, who oversees the kingdom’s sovereign wealth fund, has highlighted concerns about a lack of transparency.

en_content: The unexplained absence of Yasir al-Rumayyan, who oversees the kingdom’s sovereign wealth fund, has highlighted concerns about a lack of transparency.

title: Rising prices and bottlenecks will last longer than expected, Christine Lagarde says.
content: But the European Central Bank’s chief insisted that the increase in inflation would be temporary, as policymakers left monetary positions unchanged.
en_title: Rising prices and bottlenecks will last longer than expected, Christine Lagarde says.

title: The 37-Year-Olds Are Afraid of the 23-Year-Olds Who Work for Them
content: Twenty-somethings rolling their eyes at the habits of their elders is a longstanding trend, but many employers said there’s a new boldness in the way Gen Z dictates taste.
